attributes.action: totally cancel road pricing as it is just another stealth tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road pricing means that many will have to cease work and live on the state as they can no longer afford to travel to work! shift patterns and start/finish times mean public transport is not an option and the govt knows this!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
